text: Hi im trying to build a global partial for a DnD template.  I would like to conditionally show an image if a source exists.  My issue is I need to wrap the image in additional HTML

`{% if executive_image.src %}`
        `<div class="image-wrapper">`
          `{% linked_image "executive_image"` 
            `label="Executive photo",` 
            `link="<https://twitter.com/bhalligan>",`  
            `open_in_new_tab=True,` 
            `alt="Photo of Brian Halligan",` 
            `src="<//cdn2.HubSpot.net/hub/53/file-733888619-jpg/assets/HubSpot.com/about/management/brian-home.jpg>", width="300"` 
          `%}`
        `</div>`
      `{% endif %}`
Is this possible? My example does not work
